You wake up to the sun rising over Barcelona's most famous buildings, gently streaming in through the window of your second-floor bedroom. From up here, life in Barcelona is good. Located on the intersection of Calle de Alcalá with Paseo de Recoletos and Paseo del Prado, distinct fue to its central fountain built i 1782 (Cibeles fountain) and for the four representative buildings; Buenavista Palace (Army base), Linares Palace (America House), Commications Palace (home to Madrid's Mayor) and Bank of Spain. Following Calle de Alcalá you'll find another symbol of the city, Puerta de Alcalá, which owes its name to Alcalá de Henares who took this way to the city. From Plaza de Cibeles, following Paseo del Prado towards the south some 10 minutes, you'll reach the Prado Museum, Thyssen-Bornemisza and the Royal Botanic Garden. Located in the heart of the city and within walking distance of the main monuments, museums and touristic areas.  A short 3 minute walk to Gran Via, calle de Alcalá and plaza de Callao, where you will find some of the most emblematic historical buildings of the city.  Also, 5 minutes away you will find yourself at Plaza de España and Puerta del Sol, the square where all Spanish roads begin, where people of Madrid meet every New Year´s Eve to welcome the New Year and where the statue of el Oso y el Madroño (the bear and the strawberry tree), symbol of Madrid is located. A further 10 minutes walk is the Plaza Mayor.  You can also walk to the San Miguel Market, el Palacio de Oriente and el Teatro Real, near the Plaza de Opera and the Plaza de las Descalzas.  On Sundays, you may also visit the areas known as Lavapiés and La Latina, where you can shop at the oldest street market: El Rastro. Apartamento equipado con todas las comodidades. Cuentan con un dormitorio con opción a camas supletorias, grandes armarios empotrados, un espacioso salón comedor, un baño completo y una cocina totalmente equipada. Se trata de una calle quieta dentro de una zona muy dinámica: situado a dos pasos de la Gran Vía, el apartamento está al alcance de una gran multitud de bares y restaurantes, por los que se caracteriza  el barrio de Gran Vía. Si  se atraviesa  la Gran Vía y sucesivamente la Calle de Alcalá, se llega a uno de los lugares símbolos de la capital: la Plaza de Cibeles. Ubicada en la intersección de la calle de Alcalá con los paseos de Recoletos y del Prado, es peculiar por su fuente central del 1782 (la fuente de Cibeles) y por tener en cada esquina cuatro edificios representativos: el Palacio de Buenavista (Cuartel General del Ejército), el Palacio de Linares (Casa de América), el Palacio de Comunicaciones (sede del Alcaldía de Madrid) y el Banco de España. Located on a hill 36 km. Palma, the small town of Buger dominates a large tract of land in the north of the island. Its excellent location allows access within minutes to the beaches of the Bay of Pollensa, the Bay of Alcudia, the golf club Alcanada and Pollensa. A small group of old cottages, built in the sixteenth and seventeenth centuries are part of the farm is Rafal. House one has an extraordinary and exquisite restoration allows visitors to enjoy great comfort in an authentic Mallorcan atmosphere and in a private and exceptional environment. It was formerly Sestadors where farm animals are sheltered. Data from the late sixteenth century. Preserves the structure of the old buildings of the Majorcan countryside as well as numerous elements of traditional construciion, such as walls, windows

This apartment is located in a typical old Madrid castizo style building,  Placed in La Latina quarter, this neighborhood has witnessed thousands of stories, retaining the traditional atmosphere and being nowadays a key place in the city due to the character of its streets, place for tapas and excellent drinks. La Cava Baja was a former inn and tavern area that gave shelter to the travelers who carried goods to sell in the city markets. Today, La Cava Baja has turned into a one of the best known streets in the city, famous for its taverns and restaurants as the well-known Casa Lucio, with its popular “Broken Eggs”, which is meeting point of national and international celebrities. It is also a must for the locals after walking around El Rastro market on Sunday mornings. Meeting the Cava Baja is Almendro Street, a small street to enjoy a delightful stroll around the wonderful Plaza de los Carros. It is a nice set of 2 cottages with 2 annexes (one annex has 3 bedrooms) separated from each other between 40m. The rooms are spacious and bright, decorated with taste and simplicity. It is the only astronomical center of the Balearic Islands and promote astrophysical research. Outside there are several windmills. The area surrounding the village is dominated by hills, vast plantations and fields and some forests of oaks. It is a quiet countryside, typical of Mallorca, ideal for long walks or bike rides.
Divided up in three small levels, the ground floor comprises small kitchen and cosy living room, a large bathroom in the bottom floor and a double bedroom with a coat rack on the top floor.

You will follow the lighted pathway to your own private entrance with a convenient keypad controlled door. At the top of the stairs you will find a large private space with a king sized bed, double sinks, shower/tub, desk, and TV. (There is some additional space for a small mattress or crib - ask us if you need it!) The entryway has a well-stocked kitchenette, much as you'd find in a hotel room. There is a mini-fridge, stocked with bottled water and some local beers for our 21-and-over guests to enjoy; a microwave; a coffee maker; and all the dishes and utensils you will need to enjoy simple meals and snacks. Sadly there isn't an oven or cooktop. The main space has high, vaulted ceilings and central air conditioning and heating with your own control panel.  A large desk at the bay window overlooks mature trees and allows plenty of natural light into the space. Black out shades on windows are great for sleeping in or cool naps. For those art lovers, the area has one of the most characteristic looks into the city, iron balconies, red brick buildings mixed with stone ones. Sorolla's Museum (one of my favorites from Madrid) is just around the corner, as well as different embassies.

NICE AND COZY APT. BARRIO SALAMANCA  This Apartment is located in the luxurious Salamanca District of Madrid, just few minutes from RETIRO and RECOLETOS Metro Stop. It has become one of the most important commercial areas of the city and one of the areas with the greatest standard of living in Europe with a luxury shopping area around the streets: Serrano, Claudio Coello and Ortega y Gasset. This area is now known as the Madrid GOLDEN MILE.  The apartment is located just 5 minutes walk from the Golden Mile and the emblematic and significant RETIRO PARK, where you can take long walks on foot, by bike, riding in a small boat on the lake or just go to see the environment puppets and artists who frequent this park. The apartament is located in a typical madrilean Corrala. A Corrala is a characteristic type of building very common in the old Madrid, designed as a "long corridor" house usually made of wood with balconyes that face an indor space. The Corralas were inhabited by a popular and "castiza" (typical from old Madrid) population during the (PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN) and XIX centuries. The Corralas can be found in many novels along the times... Nowadays, 400 different Corralas can be still found in Madrid, many of them very popular. In the last years the Corralas are being restored and lived by young people.

Very nice 3 comfortable rooms of 50 m2, quiet. The apartment is located in the center of Paris (11 th district), in a typical Parisian building, floor (First without elevator), with beams. Description: - Living room with 1 sofa - Bathroom with bath and WC - Kitchen equipped  - Room with double bed 2 places - Second room with one little convertible sofa for one personne or 2 (size : 1,10 mettre sur 1,80 mettre) - Internet, TV - Washing machine and dryer - Linen and towels provided location: Ideal location and charm to discover Paris - Near Republique (3min walk) - Near Paris Marais (5min walk) - Near festive streets (10 min walk) - Many theaters, restaurants and bars around - Food shops close (butchers, cheese, fish, wine ...) - Supermarket in the street nearby Transport: - Metro juste down the flat (L9, L5) or République 3min walk (L3, L5, L8, L9, L11) - Bus close to the flat (3min walk ) - Many taxis 24h/24 7/7

Located in the quiet, historic centre of Llubí in the heart of Mallorca, Casa Mona is a fine example of Mallorcan architecture from the late 19th century.  Casa Mona is the place to stay for a romantic holiday, to explore Mallorca with family or friends, as a base for cycling or hiking, or as a retreat for writers and artists. Casa Mona has the charm of yesterday with today´s modern amenities.  Every light-filled room has perfect attention to detail and comfort.  Casa Mona has four large double bedrooms with shared bathrooms; one large double room with ensuite; two large private lounges; a secluded tree-filled garden; secure facilities for bicycles; and ample parking.  Casa Mona is the place to stay if you want to avoid crowds. It is only 30 minutes by car (45 minutes by public transport) from Palma de Mallorca; 20 mins from the beaches of Muro and Cant Picaford; and 25 minutes from the port of Alcudia. Within walking distance of Casa Mona there are excellent restaurants and tapas bars

This modern chalet is located in a peaceful urbanisation with views to the mountains, in the area of Crestatx, near Pollença, one of the most picturesque villages on the North of the island and only 16 Km from the beaches in the area. Designed in a Mediterranean and minimalist style, with wide open spaces, all rooms have natural light and views outside. Recently built, fully equipped and decorated with modern furniture, there are 2 twin bedrooms, 1 double bedroom with en suite bathroom and a kitchen adjoins the spacious living/dining room. Private swimming pool, various terraces (one of them furnished), sun loungers and an outdoor shower with hot water.  TC10343

Querido huésped, Es un placer ofrecerte mi hogar y hacer que te sientas como en tu casa. Es el lugar perfecto para que disfrutes de Madrid, su excelente ubicación te permitirá conocer sus principales lugares de interés turístico.  Mi disposición y cercanía hará que no te sientas solo en Madrid...hago especial referencia a la limpieza del apartamento que me parece fundamental para un estancia perfecta

Our flat is in a very safe and quite neighborhood, so close to the city centre, one minute to the metro and bus station and a walking distance to the train station and many important museums in Madrid, beside the Retiro park,around you will find what ever you may need (supermarket, pharmacy, bars and restaurants, extra) the wifi conection is great, and surely the hosts are so friendly ;)
casa acogedora en ambiente familiar en zona residencial y cerca del centro rodeado de jardines tiendas, centro comercial y ocio en la zona transporte a 3 minutos

La habitación se encuentra en el centro de Malasaña, en una vivienda de cuatro dormitorios, todas las habitaciones tienen llave de seguridad. El habitación solo pueden dormir la persona que solicitan la reserva. No existe convivencia familiar, si con otros huespedes.  Valoramos la privacidad.

El trato y los servicios extras totalmente gratuitos que ofrecemos como desayuno,dejamos la nevera de refrescos, leche,cafetera con sus cápsulas,exprimidor justo a naranjas naturales,tostadas,mantequillas,mermeladas m,etc...

Todas las camas del piso son de matrimonio. Se trata de un segundo piso sin ascensor, pero el edificio cuenta con conserje. La cocina dispone de todo el menaje necesario para cocinar y el piso ha sido recientemente reformado.

Great location in East London. Creative area, and very central. From Bethnal Green station you can be in Oxford Street in under 20 minutes. Room is a small double suitable for a single person or a couple. Please let me know arrival time when you book because I may need to make arrangements to give you the keys. My flat is small but it is clean and tidy and has everything you will need, although of course it is not the same as modern hotels or newer apartments that you will find on airbnb. However it makes up for that in charm and location!
It is a house decorated with very much love, I like the authentic and simple things, you will feel like in your house.  The bedroom has key.  In the house we have a zone for smokers.

- Sofá con chaiselonge, convertible en cama de 140 x 200 cm muy confortable (con topper).  - 2 armarios y 4 altillos, lacados alto brillo blanco. - Baño con ducha hidromasaje. - 1 cocina con menaje de mesa y todo lo necesario para cocinar. - Mesa- aparador deslizante con 2 sillas de diseño. - Electrodomésticos: Placa inducción, microondas, frigorífico, extractor, cafetera, exprimidor, tostador, secador de pelo.  - Laundry compartido con Plancha, tabla, lavadora y secadora.

el trato con las personas y la hospitalidad con cada persona que pasa por esta casa siempre es lo mas importante que lleguen y se marchen contentos de haber pasado una estancia agradable en todos los sentidos

Mi casa es muy acogedora y tiene personalidad propia. The location of this apartment is ideal for visiting the city. It is a 10 minute walk from Puerta del Sol and 10 minutes walk from Atocha train station. *Possibility to rent together with another apartment ( next door ) for families or groups: https://www.airbnb.es/rooms/6605890

Apartment recently renovated with all amenities and in the neighborhood of La Latina! All the historic center of Madrid at your feet while enjoying a modern and flexible personalized attention. You will not regret!

La casa está situada en pleno centro de la ciudad a 50 minutos del aeropuerto en metro y a 15 minutos de la estación de tren Atocha Renfe. Apartment in the heart of Madrid, in the Plaza de Cascorro (URL HIDDEN) heart is a yard, construction typically Madrid, located in one of the oldest districts of Madrid. It was founded in the time of Ferdinand and Isabella (1495) as one of the first extensions of the old village and later became an emblem of old Madrid. The apartment is suitable for two / three people and is equipped to make you feel at home, has separate bedroom with double bed, living room with sofa bed, kitchen (with the necessary items such as washing machine, hob and fridge freezer ), bathroom (shower bath), closets and storage spaces, television, heating and air conditioning as well as sheets, blankets, towels.The building is located in a central location, just steps from the most emblematic of Madrid

Hi you there! HERE IS THE DEAL: I will go on with my normal life (my name is Marco Tavolaro, I'm a 29 years old Italian visual artist) and you (whoever you are, you're welcome) will have breakfast with me and then go and visit this beautiful city with my personal advises. ;) If you want, you'll be able to cook at home, and actually, we could organize so I can cook some good original Italian dish for both. At night I'll sleep in a single bed downstairs, and you in the double one upstairs. If you're alone you'll be asked to pay 25€, if you're two persons, 40€ (20€ each one). ABOUT MY LOFT: I love it, it's not so big but beautiful and situated in the very centric area of Lavapiés. Large hall, homely and furnished with some of my art works, double bed upstairs, under a wooden roof with a little visual surprise that you'll encounter as you come. Downstairs I left a single bed for a possible third guest. All the comforts: - Kitchen fully equipped with microwave, fridge, cooking utensils, pot

Single studio located in a sloping roof. It has 30 m2 and has the sleeping area, full kitchen (fridge, washing machine, heater, electric stove), desk and bathroom with shower. Next to the musseums area: Reina Sofia, Prado and Thyssen, and close to the  Retiro Park. Two Metro stations, Palos de la Frontera and Atocha Renfe
Modern apartment with 2 bedrooms, one bathroom and a fully-equipped open kitchen (Tv, Sofa, coffee machine, washing machine, dishwasher, refrigerator, etc. ) Perfect for couples and families.

Very bright penthouse, the south orientation gives it a special light, being able to enjoy the sunsets of Madrid. It has spectacular views, from the Atocha station, the Retiro Observatory and the Sierra de Madrid. The living room of 30m2 is a very comfortable space, the bedrooms quiet and quiet, the terrace is very nice.

Over 3 bedrooms, 2 double and 1 single, 2 bathrooms, a spacious living and dining area, fully equipped kitchen and additional terrace space, this apartment very comfortably accommodates 5 guests. The apartment is bright and airy with crisp white washed walls and laminate flooring. Simplistic in design and style but with elements of warm, homely furnishings and fittings, the space makes for a welcoming stay.  Situated just 5 minutes walking from the beach, harbour and quirky bars and restaurants, guests need not stray too far for entertainment and activity. The property is also very close to the supermarket, local fruit and veg shop and main road into the Capital city Palma, which can be accessed via bus or car in 5 minutes or a 20 minute walk.

The apartment is a haven of peace and quiet, since it is inward looking and on the fourth floor—a huge plus for guests eager to unwind after a hard day’s sightseeing. It has three bedrooms and a full bathroom with shower and can sleep six.  You need to pass through the bedroom with a truckle bed to reach the double bedroom with a 150 cm bed. The apartment has been tastefully decorated in style, making use of the latest trends in colours and materials. Shades of sky blue and white combine with striped wallpaper and glass to give the charming, welcoming rooms a bright and elegant touch.

Apartamento con patio 35m2 de un dormitorio con cama de 1,50m y salón con cocina con sillon cama de 2,0m. Muy comodo para 4 personas. Muy luminoso, tranquilo y ubicado en un zona con todos los servicios. Bancos, supermercados, farmacias, bares, etc...

Apartment of 100 m2 with a lot of charm. Luminous, spacious, high ceilings, parquet ... It has: large entrance, living room with 3 sofas with capacity for 6 people, fully equipped kitchen with dining table and 6 chairs and 3 separate bedrooms and two full bathrooms. Two of the bedrooms have one single bed, the third one has two single beds and the fourth one a double bed. Located on the second floor of a building with doorman and elevator. The apartment has lots of natural light and is very quiet. * We have cot on request.
Ideal for overnights being close to the airport or to relax after a long day out visiting Madrid.

The flat is recently renovated, modern and well located (110 square meters, in one of the best and safest districts - centrical, well connected and though quiet and green). And there is a sunny and comfortable room available for rent :) The room to rent is on the sunny westside of the flat, has a green courtyard in front of it and is recently furnished (big bed, closet, sofa, writing desk, etc.). Besides your room there's a kitchen incl. dishwasher available, a bathroom incl. bath tub and shower, an anteroom, a living room incl. TV (not available during sleeping hours), a balcony and wireless internet. So the flat is big and comfortable - and located inside a big green courtyard which is closed at night for increased security (but you get your key, no worries ;)). You can rent one room but if you need another single room in our apartment, we have this link...  https://www.airbnb.es/rooms/18037569  Or you can add an individual mattress on the floor for another person, for 5 euros extra the night.

The house is remodeled recently, so has changed from the pictures: it is now freshly painted, with soil stabbed / varnishing (! Is bright), with much less stuff since I no longer live there, now the house is adapted totally for stays of travelers with all necessities.

Beautiful and charming penthouse at the heart of Madrid. Very bright and quiet. Functional but so full of details. You will feel at home! One bedroom with dresser room; living room with  sofa-bed, and office kitchen. Free WIFI. Just refurbished, it’s located in a privileged area, very close to the main museums and sightseeing attractions of the city: 5 minutes walking  to the Reina Sofía Museum, 10 minutes walking to El Prado and Caixa Forum.; 10 minutes walking to Parque del Retiro (the well-known “lung” of Madrid and perfect for running fans). Besides it is 5 minutes walking from the Atocha Station, the main train station in the city, so you will have an excellent communication to every main point of Madrid, and direct bus to the Barajas Airport, (URL HIDDEN) or direct train (URL HIDDEN) You can even walk up the street to get at La Puerta del Sol. An arty designed and functional jewel In a perfect placement.

El estudio es muy luminoso y renovado hace poco tiempo. Dispone de una cocina con vitrocerámica, nevera y lavadora, además de todos los utensilios para cocinar que necesites. El cuarto de baño es grande y tiene bañera. Del balcón se aprecian los edificios y vistas de la calle Atocha.

Una casa muy bonita y acogedora donde todo el mundo se siente bien nada mas entrar. Tiene todas las comodidades y puedes disfrutar de la terraza cuando desees. La casa fue construida en 1846, está en una calle muy tranquila por donde apenas pasan coches. Al lado de los Jardines de Sabatini, el Templo de Debod y algo mas abajo el Parque del Oeste que hacen que te sientas en un lugar privilegiado. Si te gusta pasearte por zonas mas mundanas pobladas de tiendas y bares no tienes mas que subir hacia Gran Via y en 5 minutos te encuentras rodeada de gente. Caminando a 15 minutos estarás en Malasaña o Chueca, si prefieres ir hacia el otro lado dirección Puerta del Sol, Latina, El Rastro, etc. todo caminando, pues no hay ni 3 estaciones de metro. Varias líneas de metro desde Opera o Plaza de España te llevarán a donde no quieras ir caminando, también líneas de autobuses que pasan regularmente en diferentes direcciones.

Habitación exterior amplia, soleada por las mañanas y con mucha luz.  Dispone de armario empotrado de dos cuerpos y un inmenso espejo de cuerpo entero. El baño se encuentra en el interior de la habitación, lo que cuentas con mayor privacidad. Es amplio y dispone de gel, champú,  toallas , secador..

“GREAT VELAZQUEZ”  Accommodation in studio for days and months. located in a luxury building with concierge. Incredible prices for weeks and months!!! MORE THAN 3 MONTHS ASK FOR DISCOUNTS!! This studio located in one of the best areas of Madrid, in Velazquez street, Near the best and great restaurants, within walking distance to the best shops in Madrid (Salamanca district). Near is the Music Auditorium, CSIC, IEDE, IE,, CIS,French Embassy, Russian Embassy, Israel Embassy, Thayland Embassy , Mexico embassy, Unites States Embassy, Residencia de Estudiantes in Madrid, Polytechnic University. Also near the Paseo de la Castellana, Corte Ingles, Fnac, Museum and the Science Museum and The Real Madrid football Stadium, Santiago Bernabeu Stadium. The historic center of Madrid is only 10 minutes by metro Republica Argentina.  Good communication with airport etc.  The apartment has 35m2, large, exterior with good views of madrid and all new refurbished. The studio has an comfortable futon bed 1

This cosy duplex has plenty of living space to relax after a long day out and about exploring Madrid. Plush couches, great light and views that inspire are all present in this classic Madrid apartment.
Charming Duplex Apartment owned by a Madrilian Poet, that won´t leave you indifferent. It has all you need and more to enjoy the Historical Madrid.Very Comfortable and surprisingly spacious.

Apartamento con un diseño exquisito, reformado y dotado de las mejores comodidades, destacando sus magníficos techos altos y la gran luminosidad que presenta. Su forma abuhardillada espaciosa, bien distribuida y tranquila, sumada a su ubicación en el centro histórico, entre Sol y Plaza de Ópera, consiguen que desde sus ventanales se pueda disfrutar de unas maravillosas vistas. Este apartamento consta de cuatro dormitorios grandes y por tanto de capacidad para un máximo de 8 personas, dos baños totalmente equipados y acogedores salón y comedor. Cocina completamente equipada con todo lo necesario para cocinar, (sartenes, ollas, cubertería, etc.) frigorífico, lavadora, lavavajillas, vitrocerámica, microondas, horno, hervidor, tostadora y cafetera. Todo en perfecto estado. Está equipado con aire acondicionado y calefacción. Pensado para satisfacer las necesidades de todo tipo de clientes.

Excelente ubicación, puedes ir andando a La Puerta del Sol, La Latina, Lavapies, Huertas, Gran Vía y la Plaza Mayor  y disfrutar de la rica gastronomía de los diferentes restaurantes y sitios de ocio nocturno.

El piso está ubicado en uno de los mejores barrios de Madrid, Antón Martin. Barrio Madrileño de artistas y poetas donde conviven multitud de culturas y gente de diversas partes del mundo. A 5 minutos de los más importantes museos de arte como El Prado, Thyseen,y Reina Sofía y del parque del buen Retiro y el Jardín Botánico. Cerca de la famosa Plaza de Sol, la plaza Callao , la Gran Vía Madrileña y la estación de trenes de Atocha, a todos estos lugares puedes ir caminando.!!   En el barrio hay infinidad de restaurantes y Tabernas donde comer tapas, paellas,bares de copas, discotecas.y a 200 metros de los supermercados Carrefour, Día y Ahorra Más y del mercado de Anton Martin donde venden productos frescos como carne, pescado,marisco, frutas y verduras.  Al lado del mercado esta la Filmoteca Española, más conocida como el Cine Dore, un espacio para ver películas antiguas a precios a menos de 3 euros. Las paradas de metro son Lavapiés (linea 3) o Antón Martin (línea 1), están ubicadas a 2
The locación makes this apartment a unique place, where you can visit museums, theaters, and the most important monuments of Madrid walking, shopping areas and restaurants, pubs, disco....

Habitación doble con baño privado en piso señorial, en una magnifica zona de Madrid, zona muy conocida y valorada, con todos los servicios, (tiendas, bares, restaurantes) pero en un barrio tranquilo y familiar. Cerca del centro y de la ciudad universitaria, muy bien comunicada, parada de autobuses en la puerta de la casa y parada de metro (Islas Filipinas) a 70 m. The kitchen, with its clean lines, is both spacious and modern in design and comes fitted and furnished with all of the necessary utilities and appliances. The bedroom, meanwhile, offers an abundance of space and comfort for two – and even moreso for one. It also comes with plenty of built-in storage, luxury linens as standard, and access to its own en-suite bathroom, complete with a vast, walk-in shower.

Es un apartamento con todo lujo de detalles... cómodo, exclusivo en calidades, acogedor y con unas vistas excepcionales sobre el corazón del centro financiero, con sus rascacielos idílicos de Madrid. Los amaneceres son preciosos, despuntando el sol desde el horizonte mientras la ciudad aun duerme....pero los atardeceres son un verdadero espectáculo para los sentidos; el crepúsculo poco a poco se oculta y sus ultimos rayos de luz chocan con los edificios más altos al mismo tiempo que se enciende la iluminación urbana de la ciudad, ofreciendo una visión cosmopolita y muy "neoyorquina".....el contraste es sencillamente digno de brindar con una copa de vino desde la ventana a 18 pisos desde el suelo!! (El rito del atardecer es el momento preferido por los huéspedes, que dura aproximadamente 25 minutos en su momento de mayor esplendor) Romántico y brillante!!

Hello! Thanks for taking a look at our space. Our apartment is small and simple, and we think it´s perfect for short stays. The bed is comfortable (really!) and as hosts we´re pretty independent and you´ll have lots of freedom. You´ll have your own keys and you can come and go as you please.  Please note: the bedroom doors do not have individual locks. No hay cerraduras individuales en las puertas de las habitaciones.  In some Madrid apartments, including ours, the toilet is in a small room by itself, and the rest of the bathroom (shower, sink, etc.) is in another room.  We´re on the first floor of our building. For my fellow Americans that means that you´ll have to walk up one flight of stairs because there is no elevator. We have a small, sweet, short-haired dog named Milo. Please make sure you coordinate your check-in time with us so we can make sure someone is here. We´ll do our best to accomodate you. Checking in after 10 p.m. (22:00) comes with a 10 euro fee to be paid in cash up

Piso espacioso y muy bonito en edificio tranquilo, en la selecta zona de El Madrid de los Austrias, frente a La Plaza de la Villa y a unos 100 metros de La Plaza de oriente, por un lado, y de La Plaza Mayor por el otro. La zona está llena de pequeñas plazas y calles peatonales, es como estar en un pueblo de Castilla en mitad de Madrid. Es una zona, además, en donde se celebran muchos eventos de fiestas importante: en Semana Santa pasan dos procesiones por debajo de los balcones de la casa, en Navidades esta zona es el núcleo de las fiestas, en otoño pasa La Cañada Real por la Calle Mayor y una vez a al mes pasa por la Calle Mayor (a unos 10 metros) un desfile de caballos y carruajes de los embajadores y los cónsules que tienen que presentar sus credenciales al Rey.

The apartment, newly furnished and decorated by an experienced designer looking for relaxation and a comfortable atmosphere. It is on the third floor, overlooking the park from its three balconies. The master bedroom, decorated with acuareladas bubbles ( "Bubbles") has a double bed of 140 and a large wardrobe with drawers to arrange the clothes bags. The balcony overlooks the park. The bathroom has a shower cubicle, and a large marble countertop, toilet and bidet. The electric heater shower is located in the kitchen. From the living room leads to the kitchen, and from this we can prepare a wonderful breakfast, while watching for its glass views of the park. Gas cook

El apartamento está situado en una finca protegida del casco histórico de Madrid. Se trata de una pequeña comunidad, intercultural y donde es muy importante el respeto mutuo.
